name: Elite War Hero – Shoot the terrorists and be a real sniper in this free 3D game
name_original: Elite War Hero – Shoot the terrorists and be a real sniper in this free 3D game
description:
"Sharpen your shooting skills in this army styled sharp shooter game for mobile. Test out your aim, precision and reflexes against real world like opponents in the battlefield, where anything goes. Kill or be killed, that’s what true war heroes and born to do.


Take up the challenge of infiltrating a notorious jail compromised by the criminals and take them all out, utilizing your sharp shooter training and killer instincts. Starting by a training missions to get a brief on the inside jail environment, make way with stealth into the prison and open fire at the precise time to take the criminals by surprise. The country’s hopes are resting on you. Don’t let us down.


3D ELITE WAR HERO FEATURES
- 5 gameplay levels of FPS sharp shooter simulation
- Objective defined gameplay levels, where completing each mission unlocks rewards
- Face off with the mafia leader in the mega boss battle
- Use multiple weapons and wield 2 weapons at the same time

3D ELITE SHOOTING CONTROLS FOR MOBILEShoot down criminals ad become the war hero. The controls are specifically designed and optimized for mobile fps shooter.

UNLOCK WAR REWARDS AND EARN POWERUPS FOR YOUR HERO
Completing each mission unlocks various rewards for the elite war hero. Unlock weapons and armor to gear up for tougher battles ahead.
"
